sql-case.value: CREATE PROCEDURE proc (ofs INT, count INT) BEGIN DECLARE i INT DEFAULT ofs; WHILE i < count DO SELECT i AS i; IF LOWER(CHAR(i USING utf8) COLLATE utf8_tolower_ci) != LOWER(CHAR(i USING utf8mb4) COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_as_ci) THEN SELECT i AS 'found funny character'; END IF; SET i = i + 1; END WHILE; END
